sentences.en: a report on the unmet needs of elderly people
sentences.cn: 有关老年人生活所需不足的报告

sentences.en: a retirement village for the elderly
sentences.cn: 供老人退休后居住的村子

sentences.en: An elderly woman, arms crossed, sang the descant.
sentences.cn: 一位双臂交叉的老妇人演唱了高音部。

sentences.en: arrangers of care services for the elderly
sentences.cn: 安排照料老人的筹划者

sentences.en: care for the elderly and infirm
It occurs in elderly men, apparently as part of the ageing process.
sentences.cn: 这种情况出现在老年人当中，显然是衰老过程的一部分。

sentences.en: It will be marketed as a tonic for the elderly.
sentences.cn: 这将作为老年人滋补品在市场上销售.

sentences.en: Many of the elderly are on medication.
sentences.cn: 许多老年人都需按时服药。

sentences.en: One elderly man sat morosely at the bar.
sentences.cn: 一位老者闷闷不乐地坐在酒吧里。

sentences.en: She took them to visit her sedate, elderly cousins.
sentences.cn: 她带他们去拜访她那些不苟言笑的表兄表姐们。

sentences.en: Some of those artillery pieces look a little elderly.
sentences.cn: 那些大炮中有些看起来有点老掉牙了。

sentences.en: the costs of health care for the elderly
The elderly are a formidable force in any election.
sentences.cn: 老年人在任何选举中都是一股强大的力量。

sentences.en: The elderly live in fear of assault and murder.
sentences.cn: 老人们生活在对袭击和谋杀的恐惧之中。

sentences.en: The elderly relative had died of old age.
sentences.cn: 这位年事已高的亲戚得享天年。

sentences.en: The runaway car careered into a bench, hitting an elderly couple.
sentences.cn: 那辆失控的车猛冲到一条长椅上，撞伤了一对老夫妇。

sentences.en: We usually think of a victim of mugging as being someone elderly.
sentences.cn: 我们通常以为被拦路抢劫的受害者是老年人。

words.tran_cn: 年长的；年龄较大的；资格老的

phrases.tran_cn: 共享颐年优先配屋计划

trans.tran_cn: 年纪较大的，老人，老式的
trans.tran_en: used as a polite way of saying that someone is old or becoming old

trans.tran_cn: 到了晚年的人， 老年人
trans.tran_en: The elderly are people who are old
